title: Someone to Watch Over Me
description: Bestselling and award-winning Icelandic crime author Yrsa Sigurdardottir is back with the next book in her Th贸ra Gudmundsd贸ttir series. Someone to Watch Over Me, the fifth installment in the Th贸ra Gudmundsd贸ttir series, was named Crime Novel of the Year by the Sunday Times.A young man with Down's Syndrome has been convicted of burning down his assisted living facility and killing five people, but a fellow inmate at his secure psychiatric unit has hired Thora to prove Jakob is innocent. If he didn't do it, who did? And how is the multiple murder connected to the death of a young woman, killed in what was supposed to be a hit-and-run?
author: Yrsa Sigurdardottir
